title: Designer - Teads Brasil
content:
Teads is looking for a talented Designer to join the Teads Studio team at Teads Brasil.
You will be designing and building premium advertising creatives for the biggest brands in the world, visible on world's largest publishers, as part of the Teads Global Media Platform.
To be successful, you will optimize local and regional Brand’s assets into eye-catching, thumb-stopping interactive ads visible on premium publishers, to provide engaging and better user experiences, notably on mobile.
Key Responsibilities

Create compelling, immersive interactive video & display ads for our clients, based on briefs outlined by the client
Generate original and exciting new ideas for new or ongoing projects.
Creating custom solutions for client requirements.
Design materials true to brand identity and style guidelines.
Build prototypes and demos for new or existing products.
Run projects from start to finish.
Work closely with members of all departments, primarily Sales and Ad Operations, to gather project specs and deployment procedures.
Innovate and deliver new solutions for our ad type portfolio.
Report into the Design Lead.

Experience/Background/ 

5+ years of experience in Graphic Design, preferably for Digital Media
Bachelor’s degree in Graphic/Digital Design
Strong working knowledge of Adobe Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator in particular) 
Clear and effective written and spoken communication skills;
Fluent in English;
Ability to work to tight deadlines, time management and communicate transparently with internal and external teams;
Excellent problem solving and communication skills;

Personal attributes

Team Player with a positive, energetic, attitude
Innovative, always looking for new and productive ways to leverage the work
Ability to work independently and complete assigned tasks within identified time frames
Organized, dependable and detail oriented
High sense of urgency with an ability to work at a fast pace and respond effectively and patiently to changing requests
Able to work well under pressure

Non essential but desirable

Intermediate video editing capabilities (Adobe After Effects/Adobe Premiere)
Advanced knowledge of web development - HTML/CSS/Javascript will be considered a plus

About Teads
Teads operates a leading, cloud-based, omnichannel platform that enables programmatic digital advertising across a global ecosystem of quality digital media.
As an end-to-end solution, Teads’ modular platform allows partners to leverage buy-side, sell-side, creative, data and AI optimization technologies. For advertisers and their agencies, Teads offers a single access point to buy the inventory of many of the world’s best publishers and content providers.
Through exclusive global media partnerships, Teads enables advertisers and agencies to reach billions of unique monthly users in brand safe, responsible advertising environments, while improving the effectiveness and efficiency of digital ad transactions.
Teads partners with the leading marketers, agencies and publishers through a team of 1,200+ people in 50 offices across more than 30 countries.
We're committed to creating a dynamic work environment that values diversity and inclusion, and represents employees across a variety of skill sets. We embrace contributions from all ages, sexes, races, ethnicities, religions, sexual orientations and gender identities.
